Hamisi's lucky day
 Adelheid Marie Bwire
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Hamisi neds a new schol 
 
 uniform. 
 
 
 
 His dad takes him to 
 
 the market. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Hamisi ses a boy 
 
 wearing a beautiful 
 
 shirt. 
 
 
 
 "That is a very fine 
 
 shirt," thinks Hamisi. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 "I wish I had a shirt 
 
 like that boy," says 
 
 Hamisi. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 "Lok, she is seling 
 
 those special shirts," 
 
 says Hamisi. 
 
 
 
 "Dad, please buy 
 
 one for me," he asks. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 "Hamisi, I have to 
 
 buy your uniform," 
 
 says dad. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 "I do not have enough 
 
 money for that shirt," 
 
 says dad. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Hamisi's dad pays 
 
 for the uniform. 
 
 
 
 He is surprised when 
 
 he gets the change. 
 
 
 
 There is enough money 
 
 left over to buy a shirt! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 It is Hamisi's lucky day! 
 
 
 
 Which shirt wil he chose?
